mapper.select:
SELECT ID, HQ_CHAN_CODE, HQ_CHAN_NAME, START_MONTH, END_MONTH, HZ_YEAR, ASSESS_TARGET, YSDZ_XS, ZX_BT, HZ_MS, FW_FEE, RATE_THREE, RATE_SIX, RATE_NINE, RATE_TWELVE FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL WHERE IS_VALID = 1 AND BUSINESS_KEY IS NOT NULL AND ADD_STATE=2
AND GROUP_ID_1 = #{code}

SELECT ID, HQ_CHAN_CODE, HQ_CHAN_NAME, START_MONTH, END_MONTH, HZ_YEAR, ASSESS_TARGET, YSDZ_XS, ZX_BT, HZ_MS, FW_FEE, RATE_THREE, RATE_SIX, RATE_NINE, RATE_TWELVE FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL WHERE ID in ${id}

SELECT ID, HQ_CHAN_CODE, HQ_CHAN_NAME, START_MONTH, END_MONTH, HZ_YEAR, ASSESS_TARGET, YSDZ_XS, ZX_BT, HZ_MS, FW_FEE, RATE_THREE, RATE_SIX, RATE_NINE, RATE_TWELVE FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL (GROUP_ID_1,GROUP_ID_1_NAME,HQ_CHAN_CODE,HQ_CHAN_NAME,RENEW_STATE, RENEW_STATE,IS_VALID,HZ_YEAR,ID,USERNAME, CREATE_TIME,START_MONTH,END_MONTH,ASSESS_TARGET,RATE_THREE, RATE_SIX,RATE_NINE,RATE_TWELVE,YSDZ_XS,ZX_BT,HZ_MS,FW_FEE) SELECT GROUP_ID_1,GROUP_ID_1_NAME,HQ_CHAN_CODE,HQ_CHAN_NAME,RENEW_STATE, 0,1,#{hz_year,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{uuid},#{username}, sysdate,START_MONTH,#{end_month,jdbcType=INTEGER},${assess_target},#{rate_three}, #{rate_six},#{rate_nine},#{rate_twelve},#{ysdz_xs,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{zx_bt,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{hz_ms},#{fw_fee,jdbcType=INTEGER} FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, HQ_CHAN_CODE, HQ_CHAN_NAME, START_MONTH, END_MONTH, ASSESS_TARGET, RATE_THREE, RATE_SIX, RATE_NINE, RATE_TWELVE, HZ_YEAR, YSDZ_XS, ZX_BT, HZ_MS, FW_FEE FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL WHERE RENEW_BUS_KEY=#{businessKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL T SET T.RENEW_STATE=#{status} WHERE T.RENEW_BUS_KEY = #{businessKey}
UPDATE PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL SET RENEW_BUS_KEY=#{businessKey} WHERE WHERE ID=#{id}
UPDATE PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL SET RENEW_BUS_KEY=#{businessKey} WHERE WHERE ID IN #{id}
UPDATE PORTAL.TAB_INIT_FILE_MSG_TEMP SET INIT_ID=#{businessKey} WHERE USERNAME=#{username} AND INIT_ID IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PORTAL.TAB_INIT_FILE_MSG SELECT * FROM PORTAL.TAB_INIT_FILE_MSG_TEMP WHERE USERNAME=#{username} AND INIT_ID=#{businessKey}
